amendment.description: Amendment sought to eliminate funds for the Essential Air Service program and to apply the savings to the spending reduction account.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to eliminate funding for Essential Air Service.

vote.text: On agreeing to the McClintock amendment (A005) Failed by recorded vote: 164 - 238 (Roll no. 417).

action.text: Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the McClintock amendment (A005) Failed by recorded vote: 164 - 238 (Roll no. 417).
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A005) offered by Mr. McClintock.
